price: 95. En er is een ban gelegd over iedere stad welke Wij vernietigd hebben, zodat zij niet kunnen terugkeren (na de dood).
arabic: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waḥarāmun ʿalā qaryatin ahlaknāhā annahum lā yarjiʿūna
